name: Air Elemental Myrmidon
damageResistances: Lightning, Thunder; Bludgeoning, Piercing, and Slashing from Nonmagical Attacks
languages: Auran, one language of its creator’s choice

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The myrmidon makes three flail attacks.

actions.name: Flail
actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (1d8 + 4) force damage.

actions.name: Lightning Strike (Recharge 6)
actions.description: The myrmidon makes one flail attack. On a hit, the target takes an extra 18 (4d8) lightning damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 13 Constitution saving throw or be stunned until the end of the myrmidon’s next turn.
